name: Reaving Axe Savant
text: You have grown up on the edge of society, living a life that forced you to perform deeds you want to forget. Combat was not a choice but a means of survival. You might have once been a pirate or a highway brigand. Now, you turn your talents against any that remind you of the monster you used to be. You bring the fight to your foe and donâ€™t discriminate against opponents. An enemy is an enemy, from a simple cutthroat to the vilest warlord.

features.raider'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can make a basic attack as a free action against one creature that is prone, slowed, immobilized, or restrained before or after the extra action
features.unfairAdvantage(reavingAxeSavant)(11thLe: Slowed or immobilized creatures grant combat advantage to you, and you gain a +2 bonus to melee attack rolls against prone creatures
features.turnTheTables(16thLevel): Whenever you save against an effect, your quarry grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn

flavorText: The only answer is to fight fire with fire.
